Class dom.net.DObjectPacket 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.net.DObjectPacket
public class DObjectPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A wrapper class to hold data that a DObject can send to its other presences. Instances of this class are created on behalf of a DObject that wishes to send some message to other presences of itself. Instances are created in the ViewDObjectFacet class, the sendDataToPresences and sendDataToPresenceAtView methods. These methods are available to the root DObject class, and are therefore available to all DObjects.

The ViewDObjectFacet methods turn around and call the analogous methods on the View class with the created DObjectPacket as the parameter.

Instances of this class represent on 'unit of message' or 'packet' for serialization and asynchronous delivery (thus this class implements the Serializable interface). Basically, all it does is provide a wrapper for two data elements: the DObjectID of the sending DObject, and the Data that is provided by the DObject. Both of these must be provided for construction of instances of this class.

Author:
Scott Lewis
See Also:
Data, sendDataToPresences, sendDataToPresenceAtView, sendDataToPresences, sendDataToPresenceAtView, sendDataToRemote, sendClosureToRemote, receiveDataFromRemote, receiveClosureFromRemote

Constructor Detail

DObjectPacket

public DObjectPacket(DObjectID id,
                     Data data)
Constructor. The two data elements that this class provides a wrapper for are passed in the constructor.
Parameters:
id - the DObjectID of the sender DObject
data - the arbitrary Data sent by the requesting DObject
See Also:
sendDataToPresences, sendDataToPresenceAtView

getData

public Data getData()
Get the data that this DObjectPacket contains. May return null if no data was sent.
Returns:
Data from the DObject that created this packet
